title: Iron Housewives
overview: Mei Li , an interior designer born in the 1980s, Yilan , a business owner born in the 1970s, and Hao Weier , a fresh graduate of the post-90s generation, three women have become housewives either actively or passively. They formed an alliance, supported each other, and lived a beautiful life with both tenderness and pain: after overcoming difficulties such as high-mindedness, financial crisis, and her husband's unemployment, Mei Li changed from blind coping to light-heartedness, and finally cultivated into a good wife and good wife. mother; Yilan changed from a 'man's mother' to a 'woman's flower', which not only repaired the estrangement with her daughter, won the love of her mother-in-law, but also stabilized the unbalanced marriage; Hao Wei Er married investment bank boss Ma Guoqing . Later, living a boring 'golden bird' life, I realized that love can't come first, and finally chose to break through marriage and achieve my dream.
